effect_entries.effect: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy} against this Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy} to exactly 50%.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
変化技を　受けにくい
体に　なっている。

Makes status moves
more likely to miss.

Resiste più facilmente ai
cambiamenti di stato.

Dificulta que le afecten los
ataques de estado.

Wehrt mit robustem Körper
viele Status-Attacken ab.

Résiste mieux aux attaques
de statut.

변화 기술을 받기 어려운
몸으로 되어 있다.

へんかわざを　うけにくい
からだに　なっている。

Makes status-changing
moves more likely to miss.

Makes status-changing
moves more likely to miss.

Son corps résiste mieux
aux attaques de statut.
